items.title: Lead Front-End Developer
items.introduction: **Virtuo** is a pioneering **digital car rental company**, revolutionizing the rental experience through a seamless, app-driven platform. By eliminating traditional rental counters, Virtuo enables users to book, unlock, and manage rentals entirely from their smartphones.
description: - **Built** isomorphic websites using _TypeScript, React, Next.js, SCSS/TailwindCSS, Node.js, Express.js, and Prismic_.
- **Developed from scratch** customer, business, and blog websites.
- **Architected** mono-repo infrastructure with a _shared design system_ via Storybook.
- **Enhanced** API interaction within microservices using _typed contracts_.
- **Built** dynamic Mail micro-service with _React and PDF streaming_.

items.title: Full-Stack Developer
description: - Developed MongoDB mobile services and admin tools.
- Built business management and referral systems.

items.title: Front-End Engineer
description: - Worked in Paris and relocated to San Francisco for international project.
- Created client-side apps with Ember.js, Backbone.js, jQuery and ES6 modules.
- Built features like "People You Should Meet" with responsive design.
- Wrote server-side tests with Mocha, Chai, CasperJS, and Zombie.

items.title: Front-End Developer
description: - Developed frontend for digital agencies and integrated with Drupal.

items.title: Front-End Developer
description: - Delivered front-end projects for agencies using Modx CMS.
